ModuleDescription: Every year this course explores a different dimension of modern military history. The general theme is the nature of warfare in the 20th century with particular reference to Asia. This course is designed for students majoring in History.
Prerequisite:
Cohort 2011 and before:
Completed 80MCs, including 28MCs in HY, or 28 MCs in SC with a minimum CAP of 3.50 or be on the Honours track. Cohort 2012 onwards:
Completed 80MCs, including 28MCs in HY, or 28 MCs in SC with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track.
